newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Rate on 91-day Bahrain t-bills rises to 5.68 pct.
newsitem.headline: Rate on 91-day Bahrain t-bills rises to 5.68 pct.

text.p: The average yield at this week's tender for ten million dinars of 91-day Bahrain treasury bills rose to 5.68 percent from 5.50 percent a week ago, a spokesman for the Bahrain Monetary Agency said on Monday.
The average price dropped to 98.585 from 98.628 and the minimum price accepted was 98.580.
Banks submitted bids for 22.2 million dinars worth of bills, down from 29.4 million dinars the previous week.
The bills, maturing on June 25, were offered on Monday and will be issued on Wednesday.
